headline: Otis Chosen to Help Connect Singapore on Cross Island Line Phase 1 and Punggol Extension
summary: Otis (NYSE: OTIS), the world's leading elevator and escalator manufacturing, installation and service company, has been selected by the Land Transport Authority (LTA) to help create a seamless and user-friendly transport experience in Singapore Mass Rail Transport (MRT)'s new Cross Island Line by providing 336 heavy-duty & public service type escalators and moving walkways, together with 186 Gen3TM elevators.

content.title: Otis Chosen to Help Connect Singapore on Cross Island Line Phase 1 and Punggol Extension
content.summary: Otis (NYSE: OTIS), the world's leading elevator and escalator manufacturing, installation and service company, has been selected by the Land Transport Authority (LTA) to help create a seamless and user-friendly transport experience in Singapore Mass Rail Transport (MRT)'s new Cross Island Line by providing 336 heavy-duty & public service type escalators and moving walkways, together with 186 Gen3TM elevators.

thumbnail.caption: Singapore MRT's Cross Island Line Phase 1 and Punggol Extension will be served by Otis escalators and elevators.
